name: Grenfell Heritage Hotel & Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a long drive to get here, and the welcome was much appreciated. We received directions to the closest thing to a pub, and to Riff's, a low-cost clothing, housewares and toy store. The room was in a nice layout, with comfortable chairs for relaxation.
reviews.title: Friendly welcome to St. Anthony

reviews.text: I was impressed by this hotel. Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Basic continental breakfast is included in the price of stay. Wood floors, BBQ on outside balcony, and kitchenette. Extremely clean and comfortable. The only downside is that is doesn't have an elevator.
reviews.title: Great hotel!
Grenfell Heritage Hotel
reviews.text: Nice place, wood floors, complete kitchen. Bedroom with Queen bed, pull out bed in living room. Nice views. No elevator though. Continental breakfast a bit slim. Pleasant staff. Cute gift Convenient location north end of town.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Helpful desk staff, comfortable room, and a guest laundry!! nice extra. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine. Otherwise, the hotel was fine.
reviews.title: Nice, updated hotel
Good Place to Stay
reviews.text: Spent two nights there 2013-09-10/11. Found good sized rooms, very clean and quiet accommodations with helpful staff. The included continental breakfast was light but good. The hotel is well-located in the town, close to the Grenfell exhibits. It is also an easy drive out to L'anse aux meadows National Historic Park where many tourists are heading for driving to this part of the Northern Peninsula of NL. Recommend to anyone looking for accommodations in this area.

description: Grenfell Heritage Hotel & Suites is your home away from home. It is a modern, well appointed 20 room hotel. Each room is very spacious and has its own balcony and kitchen area. Offers the latest in guest amenities such as wireless Internet, cable television, air conditioning, continental breakfast, etc. Also a great place for a conference or business meeting as there is an on-site conference room and boardroom.
